LanguageData.Turret_40mmGun.label: bofors 40mm
LanguageData.Turret_40mmGun.description: A 40mm flak gun. leaves gun crates when deconstructed. Must be manned. Cannot fire over wall. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Artillery_40mmGun.label: 40mm gun
LanguageData.AAA_Turret_Dual40mmGun.label: Dual Bofors 40mm
LanguageData.AAA_Turret_Dual40mmGun.description: Dual 40mm flak gun. leaves gun crates when deconstructed. Must be manned. Cannot fire over wall. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.AAA_Artillery_Dual40mmGun.label: Dual 40mm gun
LanguageData.AAA_Turret_Quad40mmGun.label: Quad Bofors 40mm
LanguageData.AAA_Turret_Quad40mmGun.description: Quad 40mm flak gun. leaves gun crates when deconstructed. Must be manned. Cannot fire over wall. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.AAA_Artillery_Quad40mmGun.label: Dual 40mm gun
LanguageData.AAA_Crate_Bofors.label: 40mm machine gun crate
LanguageData.AAA_Crate_Bofors.description: 40mm Bofors anti aircraft artillery. This is too heavy to hold. you need to make a turret for this.
